projects.smart-shift.title: Smart Shift Scheduler

projects.smart-shift.long: Workforce management SaaS using Next.js 16, reducing schedule planning time from hours to minutes via automation. Achieved Perfect SEO (100/100) and High Best Practices (92/100) via Lighthouse audit.
